org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.learning.async.a3c.discrete

Class A3CThreadDiscrete<OBSERVATION extends Encodable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.learning.async.AsyncThread<OBSERVATION,Integer,DiscreteSpace,NN>
        • org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.learning.async.AsyncThreadDiscrete<OBSERVATION,IActorCritic>
          • org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.learning.async.a3c.discrete.A3CThreadDiscrete<OBSERVATION>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, IEpochTrainer

    public class A3CThreadDiscrete<OBSERVATION extends Encodable>
extends AsyncThreadDiscrete<OBSERVATION,IActorCritic>
    Author:
    rubenfiszel (ruben.fiszel@epfl.ch) 7/23/16.

    Local thread as described in the https://arxiv.org/abs/1602.01783 paper.
